channel.title: Meetup on mrnice.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Meetup on mrnice.dev

item.title: üåò AI Roundtables @lunar.dev
item.description:
Thank You, Lunar Team

Before diving into all the AI insights: thanks Luli, Gabbay, Chen from lunar.dev for arranging these meetups and letting me be a part of what y’all are building. Leading the charge on AI thought leadership is hard with so much BS in the air.

I definitely learned a ton, met cool folks from the industry, and even had fun. So thanks! üôè

Alright, enough schmoozing. Let’s get to the good stuff. I wrote down these notes during the meetup, so obviously I might have missed some things; if you were there and want to add something, please reach out.

item.title: GopherCon Israel 2024
item.description:
GopherCon Israel 2024! What a fun day.

Started by seeing lots of familiar faces! Miki Tebeka, Yarden Laifenfeld, Liri Sokol, Guy Brandwine, Itamar Knafo, Ran Bar-Zik and more. It’s a lot of fun knowing people and saying hi to everyone, and meeting new people, too.

I arrived there and met some people from Orca Security (where I work right now). These are my raw notes from the event, not too much editing, mostly for my peeps from Orca’s Golang Guild. üêã
